adjustPosition.description: When the keyboard pops up, whether the page is automatically pushed up
adjustPosition.description_zh: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

dot.description: Whether or not to fill with dots

mode.description: For mode selection, see "Basic Usage" above
mode.description_zh: 模式选择，见上方"基本使用"说明

hairline.description: Whether the border is thin or not

focus.description: Whether or not to get focus automatically

bold.description: Whether the font and input dash are bold
bold.description_zh: 字体和输入横线是否加粗

size.description: The size of the input box, width equals height
size.description_zh: 输入框的大小，宽等于高

disabledKeyboard.description: It is forbidden to click on the input box to evoke the system keyboard
disabledKeyboard.description_zh: 禁止点击输入框唤起系统键盘

disabledDot.description: Whether it is forbidden to enter "." symbol

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the input content changes, as described above
events.description_zh: 输入内容发生改变时触发，具体见上方说明

events.name: finish
events.description: Triggered when the number of input characters reaches the maxlength value, see the description above
events.description_zh: 输入字符个数达maxlength值时触发，见上方说明
